metadata.title: CVE-2022-25648 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: The package git before 1.11.0 are vulnerable to Command Injection via gitargument injection. When calling the fetch(remote = 'origin', opts = {})function, the remote parameter is passed to the git fetch subcommand in away that additional flags can be set. The additional flags can be used toperform a command injection.

criterions.comment: ruby-git package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
